name: 抜刀術の構え 緋村剣心
expansion: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Swordsman Romantic Story
ability: AUTO - When this is placed on stage from hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card among them, add it to hand, and send the rest to Waiting Room.

AUTO - {CX Combo} RESONATE [(1) Discard 1 card, Reveal {TD 0/0 Kenshin Riko - T13} from your hand] When this attacks, if you have the Door CX (T21) in your CX Area, you may pay cost. If you do, look at the top card of your opponent's deck, and put it on top or bottom of their deck, then deal 2 damage to your opponent.
